original_text: If there is anything they desire to learn, let them ask their husbands at home. For it is shameful for a woman to speak in church.
korean_text: 만일 무엇을 배우려거든 집에서 자기 남편에게 물을지니 여자가 교회에서 말하는 것은 부끄러운 것이라

sentences.original_text: If there is anything they desire to learn
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그들이 배우고 싶은 것이 있다면

sentences.original_text: let them ask their husbands at home
For it is shameful for a woman to speak in church
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 여자가 교회에서 말하는 것이 부끄러운 일이기 때문입니다
